relation.text: 1786 My dearest Mrs : Dickenson Ten thousand thanks for your comfortable letter , which inform
Friday I was at Mr .. Hamilton 's
look 'd very pretty She sung divinely , she this year
years ago ( perhaps seven or eight ) he went
a year a diamond and another ring & her picture , he return
am grown so great a card player that I have an invitation to a small party at cards for Sunday
never play 'd at cards on a sunday evening
write me word what yr op p inion is . -- A. Maria din 'd here yesterday
will send for her , as she could have a place now
